data.title: 2014 Zandvoort Historic GP: Shirley van der Lof
data.meta_description: Friday paddock atmosphere at the 2014 Historic GP at Zandvoort: Shirley van der Lof preparing to practice Ad van der Kroft's HWM-Alta, a car similar to the one her grandfather Dries raced in his single GP appearance in the 1952 Dutch GP. I was responsible for re-uniting the Van der Lof and HWM names. The story can be found in the #007 issue of the Dutch edition of Octane magazine. Find more pictures and a comprehensive report at 8W.
data.text:
Friday paddock atmosphere at the 2014 Historic GP at Zandvoort: Shirley van der Lof preparing to practice Ad van der Kroft's HWM-Alta, a car similar to the one her grandfather Dries raced in his single GP appearance in the 1952 Dutch GP.

I was responsible for re-uniting the Van der Lof and HWM names. The story can be found in the #007 issue of the Dutch edition of Octane magazine.

Find more pictures and a comprehensive report at 8W.
